keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Share Feast with Marines
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates share a celebratory feast with their former enemies, the G-5 Marines, demonstrating temporary cooperation.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's ability to form temporary alliances even with traditional enemies when circumstances require it.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Goal Revealed: Defeat Kaidou
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates' alliance with the Heart Pirates is confirmed to have the goal of taking down Emperor Kaidou.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's next major objective and enemy in the New World.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Ambition to Defeat All Emperors
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy declares the Straw Hats' ultimate goal to defeat all Four Emperors.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the massive scope of the crew's future conflicts and ambitions.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Law Cures the Children
keyMoments.description: Heart Pirates captain Trafalgar Law uses his medical expertise to cure all of Caesar's experimental subjects.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's medical capabilities and commitment to helping innocents.

keyMoments.title: Law Discusses Alliance Strategy
keyMoments.description: Captain Law discusses the pirate alliance with Smoker, revealing that Luffy is harder to control than anticipated.
keyMoments.significance: Provides insight into the dynamics of the alliance and Law's strategic thinking.

keyMoments.title: Heart Pirates Alliance Goal: Defeat Kaidou
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates' alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates is revealed to target Emperor Kaidou, with Law estimating a 30% chance of success.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's ambitious goal and the central conflict for upcoming arcs.

ships.description: A submarine used by the Heart Pirates

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a red heart-shaped design and the letters DEATH written across it
